name: inopportunely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that happens or is done at a time that is not suitable or convenient: His legs inopportunely failed him at times. Her arrival was very inopportunely timed. See
inopportune
More examplesFewer examplesThey hadn't invited Brian, but he had inopportunely tagged along.Unfortunately his parents returned home inopportunely.In the garden Vronsky had spoken about his activities inopportunely.
